action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Logged 1hour to Harvest

@heath is it okay to close?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Yes, chocolate overload!

All good in regards to the home page.

Please find details below:

Firepit Box – update to any new firepit photo from your collection
Charcoal Joes - update to any new firepit photo from your collection
Shepherds Lane - update to any new firepit photo from your collection
Georgie’s - update to any new firepit photo from your collection

Do you still have the photos otherwise I can resend the folders?

We already have Stripe integrated : ) So please let me know the exact field you would like us to collect, pricing etc.
What do you mean by this sorry?

Parking looks epic, I love it! Shall I send everything through to you so we can have this ready to go and then once we have the valet sorted we can push to go live?

Thanks as always!

CHLOE
SENIOR SALES EVENT MANAGER



20 SHEPHERD STREET,
LIVERPOOL NSW 2170

T. +61 2 8742 4033

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Wednesday, 7 April 2021 12:15 PM
To: Chloe @ The Papermill Food <chloe@thepapermillfood.com <mailto:chloe@thepapermillfood.com>>
Cc: Rula Aridah @ The Paper Mill Food <Rula@thepapermillfood.com <mailto:Rula@thepapermillfood.com>>
Subject: Re: Website updates

Hi Chloe,

Yes the long weekend was great, thanks, hope yours was too. I had a good laugh at the chocolate situation. It gets way out of hand haha.

Ok the group bookings is now live.
Regarding the home page photos… I’m not sure which ones you want to use and which ones they are to replace… Apologies, maybe I have misplaced your request, let me know and we will sort it out today.

Next steps, I agree. Let’s focus on the group bookings for now.

We already have Stripe integrated : ) So please let me know the exact field you would like us to collect, pricing etc.
Regarding the parking setup, I have created a mock up for you. Here is a video run through: https://www.loom.com/share/cda5463014774683aac4b737e6d6960b <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.loom.com%2Fshare%2Fcda5463014774683aac4b737e6d6960b&data=04%7C01%7Cchloe%40thepapermillfood.com%7C37f809f6cf06499cb34408d8f96ae96a%7Ca58a38790c384723a4189faa946030ad%7C0%7C0%7C637533584882840827%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=80wwfzQI5CCHLqPxgoxcllj0JymI9AfR6wGNt9jR7tQ%3D&reserved=0> and here is a link to the prototype: https://calendly.com/heathmaguire/evening-parking <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalendly.com%2Fheathmaguire%2Fevening-parking&data=04%7C01%7Cchloe%40thepapermillfood.com%7C37f809f6cf06499cb34408d8f96ae96a%7Ca58a38790c384723a4189faa946030ad%7C0%7C0%7C637533584882840827%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=tx7v6A3FAJURDMS%2FltrkQ89udx4kEt8ltDZfBUxoFHo%3D&reserved=0>. I can discuss this in more detail as well of course.
Noted re UberEats as well.

Thanks and speak soon,


Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>

On 6 Apr 2021, at 12:37 pm, Chloe @ The Papermill Food <chloe@thepapermillfood.com <mailto:chloe@thepapermillfood.com>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Hope you are well and had a fabulous long weekend, did you get up to anything special?

I ate way too much chocolate.

I just wanted to know:

When you think the photos will be updated as requested on the home page?
When will group bookings go live?

I feel next steps to work on would be:

Parking, have we had any luck further into this development as yet?
Gift cards going live
I will receive the API code shortly for Uber Eats which I can then send to you which will replace what Hungry Hungry was doing.

Thank you so much for all your work and effort to date, its all looking fab!

CHLOE
SENIOR SALES EVENT MANAGER
